title: Biggest Draft Mistakes With Warren Sharp, Plus Aqib Talib on Who the Best Cornerback in the NFL Draft Is | Big Board
description:
‘The Ringer Fantasy Football Show’ hosts Danny Heifetz and Danny Kelly are joined by Warren Sharp to go through some of the biggest mistakes teams make in the NFL draft. Then Danny Heifetz is joined by Super Bowl champion and host of B/R Gridiron Draft Night Aqib Talib to discuss some of the top wide receivers and cornerbacks in the draft, what his plan was after he snatched Michael Crabtree’s chain, and more.

Check out 'The Ringer Fantasy Football Show.'

Hosts: Danny Heifetz and Danny Kelly
Guests: Warren Sharp and Aqib Talib

Production Assistant: Isaiah Blakely
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
